mapper.sql:
WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode" LEFT OUTER JOIN rgaf."AfT507Shisetsu" AS "AfT507Shisetsu" ON master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shisetsuCode" = "AfT507Shisetsu"."shisetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT201TohyoJokyo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , ,
,
FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" LEFT OUTER JOIN rgaf."AfT501Tohyoku" AS "AfT501Tohyoku" ON master."afT100Shohon_senkyoShurui" = "AfT501Tohyoku"."senkyoShurui" AND master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_tohyokuCode" = "AfT501Tohyoku"."tohyokuCode" LEFT OUTER JOIN rgur."UrV0159Tohyoku" AS "UrV0159Tohyoku" ON master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_tohyokuCode" = "UrV0159Tohyoku"."tohyokuCode" AND "UrV0159Tohyoku"."yukoKaishiYMD" <= master."afT100Shohon_tohyoYMD" AND master."afT100Shohon_tohyoYMD" <= "UrV0159Tohyoku"."yukoShuryoYMD" AND "UrV0159Tohyoku"."lasdecCode" = #{地方公共団体コード} AND "UrV0159Tohyoku"."lasdecCodeRenban" = #{地方公共団体コード連番} WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 Order By master."afT201TohyoJokyo_juriYMD" Desc

SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 Order By master."afT201TohyoJokyo_juriYMD" Desc

SELECT
, , , , FROM rgaf."AfT201TohyoJokyo" AS "AfT201TohyoJokyo" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon" ON "AfT201TohyoJokyo"."shohonNo" = "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT111Senkyo" AS "AfT111Senkyo" ON ("AfT111Senkyo"."shohonNo" = "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo"
AND "AfT111Senkyo"."mutohyoSenkyoFlag" IS FALSE
AND "AfT201TohyoJokyo"."senkyoNo" = "AfT111Senkyo"."senkyoNo") INNER JOIN rgaf."AfV112SenkyoninMeibo" AS "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo" ON ("AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shohonNo" = "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" AND "AfT201TohyoJokyo"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shikibetsuCode"
AND "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."tohyokuCode" >= #{投票区コードFr}
AND "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."tohyokuCode" <= #{投票区コードTo} ) INNER JOIN rgaf."AfV113SenkyoShikaku" AS "AfT113SenkyoShikaku" ON ("AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."senkyoShurui" = (CASE WHEN "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" = '1' THEN '0' ELSE "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" END) AND "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shikibetsuCode")
WHERE "AfT201TohyoJokyo"."shohonNo" = #{抄本番号} AND "AfT201TohyoJokyo"."juriYMD" <= #{受理日}

WITH master AS ( ) ,masterCodes AS ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode"::text) AS codeList FROM master )
SELECT master.* , FROM master INNER JOIN
( select codeList from masterCodes )
AS
ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" WHERE CARDINALITY( (select codeList from masterCodes) ) > 0 ${order順}

rgua."UaFt200FindShikibetsuTaisho"( #{uaft200_dataShutokuKubun}, (select MAX("afT100Shohon_tohyoYMD") from master), #{uaft200_jutogaiYusenFlag}, #{uaft200_gyomuCode}, #{uaft200_setaiinShutoku},
${uaft200_shikibetsuCode},
#{uaft200_shikibetsuCode},
#{uaft200_setaiCode}, #{uaft200_kojinNo}, #{uaft200_hojinNo}, #{uaft200_juminhyoCode}, #{uaft200_zairyuCardtoNo}, #{uaft200_shimei}, #{uaft200_shimeiBunkatsu1}, #{uaft200_shimeiBunkatsu2}, #{uaft200_shimeiBunkatsu3}, #{uaft200_shimei_joken}, #{uaft200_shimei_rirekiumu}, #{uaft200_seinengappiYmd}, #{uaft200_seibetsuCode}, #{uaft200_choikiCode}, #{uaft200_choiki}, #{uaft200_zenkokuJushoCode}, #{uaft200_zenkokuJusho}, #{uaft200_jushoMeisho_Joken}, #{uaft200_jusho_rirekiumu}, #{uaft200_gyoseikuCode}, #{uaft200_chikuCode1}, #{uaft200_chikuCode2}, #{uaft200_chikuCode3}, #{uaft200_banchiCode1}, #{uaft200_banchiCode2}, #{uaft200_banchiCode3}, #{uaft200_banchiCode4}, #{uaft200_katagakiMeisho}, #{uaft200_katagaki_Joken}, #{uaft200_yubinNo}, #{uaft200_juminJutonaiNihonjin}, #{uaft200_juminJutonaiGaikokujin}, #{uaft200_juminJutogaiNihonjin}, #{uaft200_juminJutogaiGaikokujin}, #{uaft200_jumin_Hojin}, #{uaft200_jumin_Kyoyusha}, #{uaft200_juminJotaiJumin}, #{uaft200_juminJotaiJutogai}, #{uaft200_juminJotaiShojosha}, #{uaft200_juminJotaiTenshutsusha}, #{uaft200_juminJotaiShibosha}, #{uaft200_renrakusaki}, #{uaft200_hojinKeitaiCode}, #{uaft200_daihyoShikibetsuCode}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimei}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimeiBunkatsu1}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimeiBunkatsu2}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimeiBunkatsu3}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimei_joken}, #{uaft200_daihyoShimei_rirekiumu}, #{uaft200_kokusekiChiikiCode}, #{uaft200_lasdecCode}, #{uaft200_sakujoShutoku}, #{uaft200_doitsuninYusen}, #{uaft200_kosekiShutoku}, #{uaft200_choikiCode_ST}, #{uaft200_choikiCode_ED}, #{uaft200_zenkokuJushoCode_ST}, #{uaft200_zenkokuJushoCode_ED}, #{uaft200_gyoseikuCode_ST}, #{uaft200_gyoseikuCode_ED}, #{uaft200_chikuCode1_ST}, #{uaft200_chikuCode1_ED}, #{uaft200_chikuCode2_ST}, #{uaft200_chikuCode2_ED}, #{uaft200_chikuCode3_ST}, #{uaft200_chikuCode3_ED}, #{uaft200_shikibetsuCode_ST}, #{uaft200_shikibetsuCode_ED}, #{uaft200_setaiCode_ST}, #{uaft200_setaiCode_ED}, #{uaft200_yubinNo_ST}, #{uaft200_yubinNo_ED},
